greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: In prime factorization of n replace all single (i.e., non-twin) primes with 1.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Multiplicative with a(p) = (if p+2 or p-2 is prime then p else 1), p prime.
mathematica: f[p_, e_] := If[!Or @@ PrimeQ[p + {-2, 2}], 1, p^e]; a[n_] := Times @@ f @@@ FactorInteger[n]; Array[a, 81] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Jan 10 2020 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 20 2002
